classes.name: Options
classes.brief:
Configuration options for qpOASES QP solver

The Options class controls solver behavior including:
- Termination criteria (tolerances, iteration limits)
- Numerical parameters (regularization, pivoting)
- Output/printing verbosity
- Initial homotopy and scaling options

Preset configurations:
- setToDefault(): Balanced defaults
- setToReliable(): Maximum robustness
- setToMPC(): Fast for model predictive control
- setToFast(): Maximum speed, less robust

classes.name: QProblemB
classes.brief:
Box-constrained QP solver (bounds only, no linear constraints)

Solves QPs with only variable bounds (no constraint matrix A):

classes.name: SQProblem
classes.brief:
Sequential QP solver with varying Hessian and constraint matrices

SQProblem extends QProblem to handle QPs where the Hessian H and
constraint matrix A change between solves. This is common in:
- Nonlinear MPC (linearization changes each step)
- Sequential Quadratic Programming (SQP) for NLP
- Moving horizon estimation
